title: Got Pulsefire Ezreal in the mystery gift, but not the icon.
body: I got Pulsefire Ezreal in the mystery gift from Riot. The icon doesn't show up, even when I log back in. Do we get the icon if we're gifted Pulsefire Ezreal?  {{champion:81}}

replies.body: You may not be eligible to get the icons/borders if you were mystery gifted the skin. I'm not too sure, but send in a support ticket to Riot and see what they see about it.
